effect.name: Advanced 3-color palette swap
effect.author: asker
effect.description:
Swap up to three different colors to other colors, with custom brightness. If a color swap is enabled, it will swap all pixels where that color is dominant and the other two color channels are of equal value. Brightness of the new color is determined by the channel values.
Last Updated: 2025-11-04 16:19

parameter.name: Swap Red
parameter.description: Enable this to swap pixels where Green = Blue

parameter.name: Red Replacement Color
parameter.description: Color to substitute red pixels with

parameter.name: Swap Green
parameter.description: Enable this to swap pixels where Red = Blue

parameter.name: Green Replacement Color
parameter.description: Color to substitute green pixels with

parameter.name: Swap Blue
parameter.description: Enable this to swap pixels where Red = Green
